mapper.select: SELECT '김교원 지점' AS COL1 , '2020-10-12' AS COL2 , '27' AS COL3 , '플래너' AS COL4 , '2020-10-23' AS COL5 , '-' AS COL6 FROM DUAL

SELECT '정수기1' AS COL1 , 12 AS COL2 , 12 AS COL3 , 12345 AS COL4 , 12 AS COL5 , 12 AS COL6 , 12345 AS COL7 , 123450 AS COL8 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '정수기2' AS COL1 , 12 AS COL2 , 12 AS COL3 , 12345 AS COL4 , 12 AS COL5 , 12 AS COL6 , 12345 AS COL7 , 123450 AS COL8 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '정수기3' AS COL1 , 12 AS COL2 , 12 AS COL3 , 12345 AS COL4 , 12 AS COL5 , 12 AS COL6 , 12345 AS COL7 , 123450 AS COL8 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '정수기4' AS COL1 , 12 AS COL2 , 12 AS COL3 , 12345 AS COL4 , 12 AS COL5 , 12 AS COL6 , 12345 AS COL7 , 123450 AS COL8 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '청정기1' AS COL1 , 12 AS COL2 , 12 AS COL3 , 12345 AS COL4 , 12 AS COL5 , 12 AS COL6 , 12345 AS COL7 , 123450 AS COL8 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '청정기2' AS COL1 , 12 AS COL2 , 12 AS COL3 , 12345 AS COL4 , 12 AS COL5 , 12 AS COL6 , 12345 AS COL7 , 123450 AS COL8 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '아웃소싱,커피,삼성' AS COL1 , 12 AS COL2 , 12 AS COL3 , 12345 AS COL4 , 12 AS COL5 , 12 AS COL6 , 12345 AS COL7 , 123450 AS COL8 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '비데,연수기' AS COL1 , 12 AS COL2 , 12 AS COL3 , 12345 AS COL4 , 12 AS COL5 , 12 AS COL6 , 12345 AS COL7 , 123450 AS COL8 FROM DUAL

SELECT '관리수당' AS COL1 , 123450 AS COL2 , 550 AS COL3 , 10000 AS COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '판매장려' AS COL1 , 123450 AS COL2 , 550 AS COL3 , 10000 AS COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '판매미팅' AS COL1 , 123450 AS COL2 , 550 AS COL3 , 10000 AS COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '판매소급' AS COL1 , 123450 AS COL2 , 550 AS COL3 , 10000 AS COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '정착' AS COL1 , 123450 AS COL2 , 550 AS COL3 , 10000 AS COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '급지' AS COL1 , 123450 AS COL2 , 550 AS COL3 , 10000 AS COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '통신수당' AS COL1 , 123450 AS COL2 , 550 AS COL3 , 10000 AS COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '기타수당' AS COL1 , 123450 AS COL2 , 550 AS COL3 , 10000 AS COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '유니폼' AS COL1 , 123450 AS COL2 , 550 AS COL3 , 10000 AS COL4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '사전방문' AS COL1 , 123450 AS COL2 , 550 AS COL3 , 10000 AS COL4 FROM DUAL
